Dear Santiam Community,

My heart sinks for our community and the losses. Right now, don't worry about school. Take care of your safety and family.

Chromebook and material pickup that was scheduled for today and tomorrow is postponed. The new dates are unknown, but we will let you know once they are set.

First day of school will most likely be postponed. No formal decision has been made on this, but I can safely say we will not be starting school this week. Once we can get back into the district and assess the situation, we will be making adjustments to the school calendar and let families know.

Right now, all we can focus on is safety. Take care and reach out to other Canyon residents to make they are safe as well. Now is our time to stand together and support each other through this disaster.

Todd Miller, Superintendent

HMK Company is with Frank Lumber Co. Inc. and 2 others.
June 4 at 1:23 PM · Mill City, OR ·

We are extremely excited and proud of the innovative building solutions and partnerships with local businesses. Amazing things happen when communities strategize and work together to support their local school districts.

Extensive discussion was had at last week's school board meeting about the new school plans we have worked through, and there was a general consensus that the plan we last developed, roughly $17 million, including new classrooms and auxiliary gymnasium at Santiam Junior/Senior High School and cafeteria at Santiam Elementary School was favored based on the cost savings compared to other plans, the confidence in the building construction and the impact these improvements can have upon our students.

As a result, the board decided to add a special board meeting for January 28th at 5:30 pm to use as a work session to finalize construction costs and ballot information. No formal action was taken, yet this is a strong indication of the direction and commitment. Once costs are finalized and a ballot title and description are written, the board will then be able to make a final approval for the May election. To learn more about all the school bond planning done thus far, check out the link provide here: http://www.santiam.k12.or.us/documents/SCSDBondPresentationv2pptx.pdf

You could circle the world 1.8 times with the amount of Nutella® produced in one year.
